definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
unable to take one's eyes off (idiom); to gaze steadily/to stare
to paint a dragon and dot in the eyes (idiom); fig. to add the vital finishing touch/the crucial point that brings the subject to life/a few words to clinch the point
to add the finishing touch (abbr. for 畫龍點睛|画龙点睛[hua4 long2 dian3 jing1])
the brush stroke that dots in the eyes (idiom); fig. to add the vital finishing touch/the crucial point that brings the subject to life/a few words to clinch the point
to keep one's eyes open (idiom)/to be on one's guard/to be clear-eyed
to lie through one's teeth (idiom)/to talk drivel
pinyin: zheng1 zhe5 yan3 jing1 shuo1 xia1 hua4

definition: see 沒長眼睛|没长眼睛[mei2 zhang3 yan3 jing5]
(coll.) are you blind or something?/look where you're going

sentences.english: The goblin was trembling, unable to meet the red eyes high above his.
sentences.chinese: 那個妖精在發抖，不敢正視高高在上的那雙紅眼睛。

sentences.english: The sky looks a bit cloudy now but I think it will clear up.
sentences.chinese: 現在天看起來有點陰，但我想天會睛的。

sentences.english: Then, big, red-eyed bugsSTART crawling out.
sentences.chinese: 然後，紅眼睛的大蟲子就會從洞裏爬出來。

sentences.english: The penis is "kind of a barometer of the sympathetic nervous system," Montague says.
sentences.chinese: 蒙塔古說小弟弟是“某種交感神經系統睛雨表”。

sentences.english: A Red Eye is red beer with an egg yolk floating on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 雞尾酒紅眼睛需要在表面上加一個蛋黃。

sentences.english: Xiao Ming's eyes are itching; his mother believes it is because he has played computer games too long.
sentences.chinese: 睛發澀，媽媽說他是電腦遊戲玩兒的時間太長了。

sentences.english: It often means red eyes,sweaty palms and a sinking stomach.
sentences.chinese: 它意味着熬紅眼睛，十分緊張和精神沮喪。

sentences.english: The weather continuing clear, i applied myself to get up my mast and spread my sail .
sentences.chinese: 天氣始終睛和，於是我趕緊豎起桅杆，張起帆來。

sentences.english: With eyeballs rolling, the fox is thinking about how to get the piece of meat from the crow's mouth.
sentences.chinese: 睛骨碌碌地轉着，想着怎麼得到烏鴉嘴裏的那塊肉。

sentences.english: When she shouts, her two red eyes are shinning.
sentences.chinese: 她叫的時候，兩隻紅眼睛還閃啊閃的。

sentences.english: It has pretty red eyes and lovely long ears.
sentences.chinese: 它有着標緻的紅眼睛和心愛的長耳朵。

sentences.english: Some said it was actually a wolf, grey with flashing red eyes.
sentences.chinese: 有人說，它其實是一隻灰狼，紅眼睛熠熠閃爍。

sentences.english: Rabbit has two red eyes and long ears.
sentences.chinese: 兔子有紅眼睛和長耳朵。

sentences.english: I have two long ears and two red eyes.
sentences.chinese: 我有兩個長耳朵和紅眼睛。

definition: eyes bright and full of expression
to dazzle/to blink at/to open one's eyes wide
